publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1682 Stuart McMillan: Show Racism The Red Card Artwork Winners—That the Parliament congratulates the prize winners of the Show Racism The Red Card artwork, including David Ballie from Ardgowan Primary School, Greenock, Megan Leese from Holy Family Primary School, Lenzie, and Amanda Bryce and Daniella Medinelli from Greenock Academy, and acknowledges how the campaign has used the means of football to highlight racism to a global audience and allow school pupils to challenge and engage in this issue.
